subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coming off a two-game tour de force, the Nets stars Jason Kidd and Vince Carter are showing why they may be considered among the N.B.A.’s greatest perimeter tandems.
snippet: Coming off a two-game tour de force, the Nets stars Jason Kidd and Vince Carter are showing why they may be considered among the N.B.A.’s greatest perimeter tandems.
